setup: 1. Create subscription products in Shopify Admin
2. Replace the product_id and variant_id values above with your actual IDs
3. Ensure your Shopify subscription app is properly configured
4. Test the checkout flow with a test customer
instructions.product_ids_format: Use the numeric ID format (e.g., '1234567890') not the GID format
instructions.variant_ids_format: Use the numeric ID format (e.g., '9876543210') not the GID format
